name: Kovee's Completely Regular Afternoon
description: Join Kovee as they jolt THROUGH TIME and/or SPACE. Defeat an enemy raccoon emperor bringing chaos down on the future, or travel beyond the stars (or at least a reasonably elevated ascent) to vanquish a corrupt system of intergalactic justice! With two different routes and three possible endings per route, every player is certain to be granted a unique experience that will make them come back again and again.
